title: Frequent crashes and freezes
content:
For the past few weeks Firefox has been crashing and freezing often. Crashes are worst when trying to access Protonmail, which almost always crashes the tab instantly. Freezes happen most often when browsing Reddit, and also when watching Youtube, but crashes and freezes can happen on almost any website.

I have tried changing profiles, refreshing and uninstalling/reinstalling, but the problem persists and seems to be getting worse over time.

Here are some recent crash reports:

bp-3d92e88d-bdc6-4629-a869-899650250219 bp-c57e72ab-a6e5-47d4-abeb-d5ce90250219 bp-b66a1b94-6392-4fc7-a2d9-4b9ee0250219 bp-2544016d-d918-4027-9b0e-de75e0250219 bp-23ca9aa4-0934-4f23-b2e1-0390a0250219 bp-9ea6fa00-c531-428e-b276-ad3760250219 bp-4b4316fd-ccb3-4787-877b-50ed40250219 bp-fe9ecc18-35dd-4654-b0e9-45ce00250219 bp-5447133c-6fe3-43fd-800a-dbdf10250219 bp-bb92230d-09b1-4920-8cc9-355940250218 bp-a98b5c50-bddb-4693-9199-ecc500250218 bp-0089dc50-da47-4be2-8e72-0dc8f0250218 bp-57364330-d723-4f8d-85dc-f31250250218 bp-2dbcdad1-a7de-4835-ba86-335e20250218 bp-bc7ca88c-c9b2-453c-9774-537b40250218 bp-b98c0da6-12e5-4332-a6e2-4c8680250218 bp-c4e7ff86-5cc6-43d3-aac8-81ce90250218 bp-07fb322d-1f54-478f-8f2f-3db690250218 bp-9670fc71-d8d7-48db-805a-7e8a90250218 bp-862d4443-8773-48c8-a09d-de9780250218 bp-3a7354bc-3fec-44b2-a802-f54de0250218 bp-c6b3cfac-61e4-444e-88e3-02f220250218 bp-9fc98135-55df-4746-8fbd-dd5530250218 bp-422b8b89-a540-4cad-8c1c-d11a00250218

Will be grateful if someone can help me get to the bottom of this Thanks
creator: eldensymbiosis

title: News Querries on default page.
content: On my home page i have 2 rows of short cuts. Then the latest news listings. Can I change the types of news listings? For example one story might be from NPR while the next can be from CNN then another from MSNBC. Non of which interests me. Is there away to set sites in the settings to list News and events that I would be interested in? Sites like The Wire, Reuters, NewsMax, RT, The National Desk, etc. So would there be a way to get those headlines? Thanks
creator: GatorSpotter

title: http://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/firefox/releases/
content: Please indulge this silly question. What possible benefit is there for Mozilla continuing to list this page with the very first, oldest Firefox release at the the top, requiring the user, every time they visit, to scroll to the middle of the page to search out the current latest version instead of having the chronological order from latest to oldest instead?
creator: noel_envoide

title: i have problem with that

title: unable to view PDF documents within TAB
content: Hi, I am unable to view PDF documents within a TAB. This function has worked for the past 4 years, then more or less stopped overnight.
creator: xzcgbf5tsj

title: viewing pdf file
content:
Every time I try to view a pdf file on Firefox I can view the file but in the lower right 1/4 of the screen I get a graphic of a page with shaded areas representing lines with writing on them. There is a type of pen cursor moving along the line.

This happens with different pdfs - from the internet and from my saved files. This doesn't happen on another computer with Firefox.

I've deleted and redownloaded Firefox an number of times, also tried troubleshoot mode - no improvement. Virus scanned, restarted a number of times.

Pdfs work on edge and chrome and reader with no problem.

I have a screenshot.

Any Ideas? Thanks
creator: mary141

title: Lost original opening firefox page containing well used tabs of apps.  How do I get it back?
